mapper.select: select * from board order by groups desc, lev asc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert:
SELECT (IFNULL(MAX(bo_idx),0)+1) as groups FROM board
insert into board(writer, title, content, pwd, hit, groups, step, lev, regdate, f_name) values(#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{pwd}, 0, #{groups}, 0, 0, sysdate(), #{f_name})
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit + 1 where bo_idx = #{bo_idx}
